summary: Implementation plan for Chapter 10: Uploading Consciousness. Creates new nanobrain_consciousness.h/.cpp with ConsciousnessUploader, DimensionalFolder, BrainEvolutionSimulator, TimeCircuit interfaces, and ConsciousnessTestSuite. Modifies nanobrain_unified.h/.cpp for integration and CMakeLists.txt for build. Includes consciousness_demo.cpp for verification.
